Description:
Adversaries may shutdown/reboot systems to interrupt access to, or aid in the destruction of, those systems.

Author: Igor Fits, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: System Shutdown/Reboot - Linux
Query: sourcetype='linux-auditd' eql select * from _source_ where (type = 'execve' and ((log like '%shutdown%' or log like '%reboot%' or log like '%halt%' or log like '%poweroff%') or ((log like '%init%' or log like '%telinit%') and (log like '%0%' or log like '%6%'))))
